Level.campaign: Actual Lizard Tactics Jam Map for Pride
Level.Objective: Reclaim the theater and cast out all enemies!
Level.Script: Set Lesbian Talkable AddStatus/Kyat,Talkable AddStatus/Nobeta,Talkable SetString/Nobeta Can Talk,Nobeta
Set Lesbian Not Talkable RemoveStatus/Kyat,Talkable RemoveStatus/Nobeta,Talkable SetString/Nobeta Can Talk,INVALID IfPresentRun/Sandra Winterbloom,_AddStatus,StatusName,Talkable,CharacterName,Kyat

Dialogue.Branch: / Run/Set Lesbian Not Talkable SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,+:1 IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,1,Go To First Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,2,Go To Second Lesbian Dialogue IfValGoTo/Lesbian Discussions Count,=,3,Go To Third Lesbian Dialogue EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/First Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Second Lesbian Dialogue
/ LoadConv/Third Lesbian Dialogue

/ SetVal/Turn Trigger,+:1 SetVal/TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,+:1 IfValRun/Asandr Name Progress,=,1,SetString,AndrasReadyToShave,Andras Winterbloom SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,-:1 SetVal/MoreLesbianDiscussions,0 IfValRun/Lesbian Discussions,l,3,_SetVal,ValueName,MoreLesbianDiscussions,Value,1 Run/IfAllTrue_2,ValueOneName,MoreLesbianDiscussions,ValueOneCompareTo,1,ValueTwoName,TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,ValueTwoCompareTo,6 IfValRun/AnswerComposite,=,1,SetLesbianTalkable GoTo/1
/ LoadConv/Round Start Dialogue Dispatch EndConvImmediately/

/ SetVal/Lesbian Discussions Count,=:0 Run/Set Lesbian Talkable SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,0 SetString/Asandr Current Name,Drasan Winterbloom SetArea/Clothing Zone,0,8,0,4 SetString/AndrasReadyToShave,INVALID SetArea/West Approach,0,16,0,4 SetArea/Dressing Room Door,0,3,0,4 SetArea/Theater,0,8,4,16 SetArea/Outside Hut,8,13,6,12 SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:-1 SetVal/Turn Trigger,=:0 SetArea/Viewing Booth,0,3,13,15 IfValGoTo/Skip Dialogue,=,1,999 SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=:0 SetVal/Sandra Attacks,=:0 AddTagToArmy/1,IgnoreArmy,2 SetVal/TurnsSinceLastLesbianConvo,=:0 SetArea/StartingArea,14,17,10,14 GoToNextBranch/
Drasan Winterbloom/W--what? The theater! People are--? AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,right,,Shocked MoveCam/,,Drasan Winterbloom Continue./NextBranch

Rubble Rouser Bruiser/The boss says this place has got to go! No one supporting these shmucks has a place in *our* town! ClearPortraits/ MoveCam/,,Rubble Rouser Bruiser AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,left,,Mad Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Are you daft? Strider's efforts were only truly given life through *this* play. Bolt-Action Love is *the* essential crossbowpunk love story. ClearPortraits/ MoveCam/,,Loud Theater Enjoyer AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Crossbowwhatsit? Look, anything Strider, it's gotta go. Ain't she done enough damage? AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/That Rubble Rouser guy is right! We don't have to stand for this! We can take matters in to our own hands! We can tear down this injust favoritism for over-hyped product line crossbows! AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,left,,Angry MoveCam/,,Irate Crossbow Aficionado Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Uh, yeah. Yeah! Whatever gets your engine going, get smashing. AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,right,,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/Bwuh?! Hey! You can't do that! Everyone, get your community mutual defense face on, time to wrangle. ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Harrien/,Harrien/,left,,Yell Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/ MoveCam/,,Harrien EndConvImmediately/
Nobeta/This isn't how I wanted to spend today! I wanted to spend the day... AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right,,Concerned Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/...with ah... [She stammers quietly to herself] ...with friends. Hey, Kyat! AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left,,Blank FlipPortrait/Kyat Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/Oh, Nobeta. Odd, it is time to fight strange bad people, hmm? Do not worry, I will be there if you are ever harmed. FlipPortrait/Kyat Continue./NextBranch

Nobeta/I should worry about you! You are a littler girl than I. Get behind me, and we will chase these goons out. WaitForDialogue/ MovePortrait/Nobeta,10,0,100,false FlipPortrait/Nobeta Continue./NextBranch

Kyat/It can be as you say. [She watches Nobeta wiggle in the anticipation of combats] It can be time to... get behind you. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,right,,Happy SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:2 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:2 Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/Perhaps *she* can call me little girl. That would be acceptable. AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left,,Winking Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/...ah, Nobeta. [She looks up at her] Behind you, yes? AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,left,,Concerned Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/Of course! Dad always said to me, "these muscles are for protecting you, little girl." Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/O--oh. [She pauses] Yes. PortraitParticles/Kyat,Hearts Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/Well, let's go! [Nobeta leads Kyat towards her next firing position] WaitForDialogue/ MovePortrait/Nobeta,-5,0,100 MovePortrait/Kyat,5,0,100 FlipPortrait/Kyat Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/O--oh. [She stumbles along, easily moved by Nobeta] Yes. PortraitParticles/Kyat,Hearts SetStat/Kyat,Morale,+:3 SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:1 Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/Hey, Nobeta, when it is... time after the battle, would you--? AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,right FlipPortrait/Nobeta Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/[Nobeta releases tension on her bow, and turns to speak] Ah, what was that? FlipPortrait/Nobeta Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/Goodness alright calm down. PortraitParticles/Kyat,Hearts Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/Hmm? Ah, what? Something about after this battle? AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,left,,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/After this battle, would you have time for... a date? Continue./NextBranch

Nobeta/Oh! Oh! [She pauses and stares in to middle-space] Oh. Yes, actually. Plenty of time. Oh, but now, I need to... AddPortrait/Nobeta,Nobeta,left,,Happy SetStat/Nobeta,Morale,+:3 SetStat/Kyat,Kyat,+:3 Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/[Nobeta gets in to position and flexes to draw her bow] Yes. For this time, please keep doing... the things you are doing. RemovePortrait/Nobeta Continue./NextBranch

Clark/Man, I really don't wanna fight you. I was really hoping someone else would handle you... look at those arms! You could tear me apart! AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left AddPortrait/Harrien,Harrien,right Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/...Well, that just sucks all the fun out of fighting you. What's someone so meek doing with this lot? Continue./NextBranch
Clark/I... really don't know. I've been trying to find where it went wrong, but all I can really conclude is that I made very dumb decisions. Continue./NextBranch

Harrien/Sounds like a lot of us, honestly. ...Look, I can't undo the stuff you've been dealt;; but I can offer you an out. C'mon and join us! If you're on the field, you must have some skill, right? Continue./NextBranch
Clark/W-w-what? Um, I... no;; I'd really just weigh you down. Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/Hey, c'mon;; look at these guns. A little extra weight won't bug me. Continue./NextBranch

Clark/...W-well;; okay. ...Thank you. SetStat/Clark,Army,=:0 RemoveConv/Clark Dialogue RemoveStatus/Clark,Talkable RemovePortrait/Clark AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left SetStat/Clark,Morale,=4 RemoveConv/West Approach Recognized SetVal/WestApproachFlag,3 RemoveStatus/Harrien,Talkable Continue./NextBranch

Drasan Winterbloom/Oh, what do we have here? [Drasan sees an open container of clothes for performers] This is... AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Quizzical Continue./NextBranch
Drasan Winterbloom/[Drasan nervously grabs an outfit from the chest] AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,left,,Concerned Continue./NextBranch

Andras Winterbloom/I could... use a change. SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,+:1 Run/Asandr Progresses Script AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Happy PortraitParticles/Andras Winterbloom,Heart Swap Out Unit/Swap Out Name,Drasan Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Andras Winterbloom Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Andras Winterbloom SetStat/Andras Winterbloom,Morale,+:3 Continue./NextBranch

Andras Winterbloom/If I can change anything, then... [Andras carefully presses a sword to their lip] SetString/AndrasReadyToShave,INVALID AddPortrait/Andras Winterbloom,Andras Winterbloom,left,,Nervous Continue./NextBranch

Rasand Winterbloom/...that feels much better. AddPortrait/Rasand Winterbloom,Rasand Winterbloom,,Happy PortraitParticles/Rasand Winterbloom,Heart SetVal/Asandr Name Progress,+:1 Swap Out Unit/Swap Out Name,Asandr Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Rasand Winterbloom/ Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Rasand Winterbloom AddStatus/Asandr Winterbloom,Talkable SetStat/Rasand Winterbloom,Morale,+:3 Continue./NextBranch

Clark/I mean;; maybe the author made a small mistake about the bolt-head manufacturer, but-- AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,left,,Worried AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch
Irate Crossbow Aficiando/A small mistake! Lakshmi would never be caught dead wi- [The scuffle outside rattles the windows] Continue./NextBranch

Irate Crossbow Aficionado/Argh;; there's never enough time to educate arbalest-ignorants! Let's teach them proper technique! AddPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado,Irate Crossbow Aficionado,right,,Mean FlipPortrait/Irate Crossbow Aficionado Continue./NextBranch
Clark/Uh... alright... Continue./NextBranch

Clark/[He sighs] I thought that boss guy was cute enough to spend a weekend with his pals, but... Second thoughts. ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Clark,Clark,right,,Sad AddStatus/Clark,Talkable RemoveTagFromGroup/1,Passive RemoveTagFromGroup/1,Inactive AddStatus/Harrien,Talkable SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=,2 Continue./LoadConv/Round Start Dialogue Dispatch
/ SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=:1 RemoveTagFromArmy/1,Inactive RemoveTagFromArmy/1,Passive RemoveConv/West Approach Recognized EndConvImmediately/

Kyat/Finally time to wear something more comfortable, hmm? AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,left,,Happy AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,right,,Happy RemoveStatus/Kyat,Talkable IfValRun/Nobeta Can Talk,=,Nobeta,Run,_AddStatus,Kyat,Talkable Continue./NextBranch
Sandra Winterbloom/Ahah, yea, this... felt more fitting. Just wish I could do something more with my hair. Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/Y'know, I actually do have something for that. Continue./NextBranch

Kyat/And... there. Run/Asandr Progresses Script PortraitParticles/Asandr Winterbloom,Sparkles AddPortrait/Asandr Winterbloom/,Asandr Winterbloom/,right,,Happy SetStat/Asandr Winterbloom,Morale,+:2 Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Asandr Winterbloom Continue./NextBranch
Asandr Winterbloom/Aaah, I love it! And should write different, better, or more dialogue here to express that! :D Continue./NextBranch
/ SetVal/WestApproachFlag,=:1 EndConvImmediately/
/ IfValGoTo/WestApproachFlag,=,1,1 IfValGoTo/TurnsUntilBossAppears,=,0,2 EndConvImmediately/
/ LoadConv/West Approach Recognized GoTo/0

Rubble Rouser Boss/Hey;; I'm rousing here! And this is a boss fight now. SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Boss:,7,17,Left,,Add:LevelUp:9,, SpawnUnit/1,Rubble Rouser Golem:,8,16,Left AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Boss,Rubble Rouser Boss,left,,Angry SetVal/TurnsUntilBossAppears,-1 Continue./NewBranch/0
/ SetVal/SandraAttacks,+:1 IfValGoTo/SandraAttacks,g=,2,1 EndConvImmediately/

Rasand Winterbloom/Ah-hah! Hyah! [She shows a renewed energy in her motions, and keeps her eye on her target with confidence] RemoveConv/Asandr Strikes AddPortrait/Rasand Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,left,,Happy AddPortrait/-Char2Name-,-Char2Name-,right,Sad Continue./NextBranch
Rasand Winterbloom/Hoo... Yes, this feels much better. Maybe, I could make just... RemovePortrait/-Char2Name- Continue./NextBranch

Sandra Winterbloom/...just a couple more changes. SetVal/AsandrNameProgress,+:1 Run/Swap Out Name,Rasand Winterbloom,Swap In Name,Sandra Winterbloom/ ClearPortraits/ AddPortrait/Sandra Winterbloom,Sandra Winterbloom,left,,Happy PortraitParticles/Sandra Winterbloom,Hearts SetStat/Sandra Winterbloom,Morale,+:2 Run/Set Asandr Default Relationships And Change Name,New Name,Sandra Winterbloom Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Rubble Rousers, entitled critics, bah. You clearly don't see the metaphors for bittersweet sorrow in the choice of Lakshmi's bolts. AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Amused Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Golem/WRONG OPINION DETECTED. AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Golem,Rubble Rouser Golem,right,,Neutral Continue./NextBranch
Loud Theater Enjoyer/And what even *is* "over centralization" of such a crucial crossbow. Everyone knows the 20DV changed the world. Fools! Continue./NextBranch
Rubble Rouser Bruiser/Ey keep it down up there! We're busy! AddPortrait/Rubble Rouser Bruiser,Rubble Rouser Bruiser,right,,Yell Continue./NextBranch

Loud Theater Enjoyer/Did you even pick up on *any* of the subthemes about recoil representing revolution? And you dare say you know this craft! AddPortrait/Loud Theater Enjoyer,Loud Theater Enjoyer,left,,Amused Continue./NextBranch

Crossbow Aficionado/You dare?! That's it, this gas blob is getting it, too! [They hurrumph and start towards the stairs] AddPortrait/Crossbow Aficionado,Crossbow Aficionado,right,,YellMad RemoveTagFromArmy/1,IgnoreArmy,2 RemoveTagFromGroup/2,Inactive RemoveTagFromGroup/2,Passive Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Bah, what are you supposed to be? Put those muscles away, you're embarassing yourself. And geez, get freakishly tall and big why don't you? AddPortrait/Harrien,Harrien,left,,Mad AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Harrien/If you speak to my friends or I that way, I will break you. Continue./EndConv

Coderick Gutterson/Well look who inherited her father's stubby nose! Grah, bet you think that haircut will attract guys. You've got a mop like vinegar! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Nobeta/W--well, maybe I don't want to attract guys! Get your own face, loser! Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Huh, I can barely see you. You must not be important! Do everyone a favor and grow up, you little girl! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,Mad AddPortrait/Kyat,Kyat,right,,Mad Continue./NextBranch
Kyat/**You** do not get to call me a little girl. Show respect, creep. Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Ech, what are you even going for? Make up your mind! I, Coderick Gutterson, and the rest of **civil** society need to know if you're a man or not! AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,Mad AddPortrait/Arora,Arora,right,,Winking Continue./NextBranch
Arora/Ouch! My turn, how about... "Your parents named you Coderick, and you kept that name." I think mine's better. Continue./NextBranch

Coderick Gutterson/Now doesn't **someone** look entirely uncomfortable. It's your skin, buddy, get used to it! None of us can change what we are, and what I am is a **champion among vermin**. AddPortrait/Coderick Gutterson,Coderick Gutterson,left,,Mad AddPortrait/Drasan Winterbloom,Drasan Winterbloom,right,,Sad Continue./NextBranch
Drasan Winterbloom/[Drasan absently ponders] You're **so** wrong, that I think I just learned something about change. Continue./NextBranch
/[Good job finding this dialogue! You recruited Clark *before* fighting that guy? Way to go.] Continue./NextBranch
